pages.text: Imps are low ranking demons, often serving under a demonic lord, and form the backbone of demonic society, as they are the most common of the lesser demons with some modicum of intelligence, roughly equivalent to demonic peasants.

pages.title: Summoning
pages.text: Bring forth an Imp, a smaller sort of demon. The blood of a chicken must also be spilled in the circle in order to sate the Imp and start the ritual.
